price: Manusia telah dijadikan (bertabiat) tergesa-gesa.  Kelak akan Aku perIihatkan kepadamu tanda-tanda azab-Ku.  Maka janganlah kamu minta kepada-Ku mendatangkannya dengan segera.
arabic: خُلِقَ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ مِنۡ عَجَلٖۚ سَأُوْرِيكُمۡ ءَايَٰتِي فَلَا تَسۡتَعۡجِلُونِ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: khuliqa al-insānu min ʿajalin sa-urīkum āyātī falā tastaʿjilūni
